summary: A baby in a foreign land is adopted by the men on a U.S. Navy ship and brought to America.
cast: Richard Thomas|Gerald McRaney|Jonathan Banks|Doris Roberts|Keith MacKechnie|Michael Woolson|Trae Thomas|Bill Bolender|Michael Ensign|Jeanine Jackson|Eve Gordon|Adrian Sparks|Paul Sincoff|Benjamin Lum|Ric Young|Joseph Foss|James Healy Jr.|Karen S. Gregan|Kelly Cirieco|Joey Zimmerman|Thomas G. Waites|James Mesher|Joe Bays|Tim Haldeman|Charles Martinet|Bianca Lucci|Madison Lucci|Paris Lucci|Tiffany Lucci|Chase Harrigan Slover|Jason Sutliff|Darrell Britt|Carey Scott|David Grant Wright|Sean Harrington|Anup Sugunan
title: Un milagro en la guerra
